description:
Is your new year's resolution to get in shape? Want to start running? This 3-in-1 app contains an 8 week 5k (3.1 miles) program, an 8 week 10k (6.2 miles) program, and an 8 week 10k program that can be completed after finishing the 5k program. 

This app is ideal for running inside on a treadmill or outdoors. Each running program consists of 24 unique workouts to gradually train your body to run longer than you ever have before. By slowly acclimatizing your body to more and more running with each session you can reduce your likelihood of injury while feeling great as your run more and more each week. 

Learn to Run is flexible: if a workout is too easy, skip ahead; if a workout is too difficult, try it as many times as you need to until you can comfortably move up to the next level. 

Main features:

➼ 5k (3.1 miles) 8 week program with 24 unique workouts
➼ 10k (6.2 miles) 8 week program with 24 unique workouts
➼ 5k to 10k 8 week program with 24 unique workouts
➼ Workouts gradually increase over 8 weeks
➼ Flexible schedules make it easy to skip ahead or repeat workouts
➼ Audible cues to tell you when to run or walk (Touchpad only)
➼ Calculates calories burned
➼ Calculates distance travelled (if outdoors with GPS enabled)
➼ Supports phones and tablets (great for treadmill workouts)
➼ No in-app purchases; everything is included!

Start running today!

✏ If Learn to Run is helping you get in shape, please rate it!
